A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star Wars movie yet. Between this and the sleeping pill Rogue One\, I never want to see another new Star Wars movie again\, and I am a huge fan of the original trilogy and the third prequel. Why the hell did they kill Snoke and not explain anything about him? It’s things like that that even make Force Awakens a worse movie\, because now I know those were empty promises. These new Star Wars movies are awful.
